com.bandyer.core_av.capturer

Interface Capturer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CapturerAudio, CapturerAudioVideo, CapturerAudioVideoCamera, CapturerAudioVideoScreen, CapturerCameraVideo, CapturerScreenVideo, CapturerVideo

    public Capturer

    A capturer is a representation of what(device audio/camera/screen) can be used to publish in the room

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Capturer.DefaultImpls
      A capturer is a representation of what(device audio/camera/screen) can be used to publish in the room
      static class  Capturer.Registry
      Registry to create capturers Capturers are limited by hardware, there can be only one capturer for camera and screen, while there can be multiple capturers for audio.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Capturer.Registry Registry
      Registry to create capturers Capturers are limited by hardware, there can be only one capturer for camera and screen, while there can be multiple capturers for audio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Method used to dispose the capturer, called onDestroy of the activity
      java.lang.String getId()
      Capturer identifier
      CapturerState getState()
      Capturer current state
      Stream getStream()
      Captured audio or video
      boolean isRunning()
      True if the capturer is running, false otherwise
      void pause()
      Pause the capturer
      void resume()
      Resume the capturer
      void setStream(Stream p)
      Captured audio or video
      void start()
      starts the capturer, called by the user

    • Field Detail

      • Registry

        static Capturer.Registry Registry

        Registry to create capturers Capturers are limited by hardware, there can be only one capturer for camera and screen, while there can be multiple capturers for audio.
